Containers.Name: Dolphin
Containers.Description: Dolphin is KDE's default file manager. With this docker, you can access the dolphin interface through a web browser.[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [span style='color: #E80000;']8080[/span] is the WebUI port[br][br] Don't forget to enter in the host port and whatever volume you would like to mount. [br][br] To access Dolphin, open the WebUI.[br] Default resolution for the Dolphin file Manager window is 1280x720. You can change that to any resolution by opening the Advanced View and modifying the HEIGHT and WIDTH variables.
Containers.Overview: Dolphin is KDE's default file manager. With this docker, you can access the dolphin interface through a web browser.
